title: Authorizes Rockland county to publish a notice of county legislative action which directs readers to the county internet website for full text of such notices
summary: Authorizes Rockland county to publish a notice of county legislative action which directs readers to the county internet website for full text of such notices.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          833

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. RABBITT -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Local Governments

       AN ACT to amend the county law, in relation to the publication of  local
         laws and notices in Rockland county

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 214 of the county law is amended by  adding  a  new
    2  subdivision 4 to read as follows:
    3    4.  ROCKLAND COUNTY.  NOTWITHSTANDING THE REQUIREMENTS OF SUBDIVISIONS
    4  ONE AND TWO OF THIS SECTION, THE PUBLICATION OF CONCURRENT  RESOLUTIONS,
    5  ELECTION  NOTICES,  OFFICIAL CANVASS, LOCAL LAWS AND NOTICES SHALL APPLY
    6  EXCEPT THAT THE TEXT OF SUCH PUBLICATION SHALL BE LIMITED  TO  A  PUBLIC
    7  NOTICE  OF  ROCKLAND  COUNTY  LEGISLATIVE  ACTION, WHICH SHALL INCLUDE A
    8  BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF THE ACTION  TAKEN  AND  REFER  THE  READER  TO  THE
    9  ADDRESS  OF  THE  ROCKLAND  COUNTY INTERNET WEBSITE FOR THE FULL TEXT OF
   10  SUCH RESOLUTION, NOTICE, CANVASS OR LOCAL LAW.
   11    S 2. This act shall take effect on the first of January next  succeed-
   12  ing the date on which it shall have become a law.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01625-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the county law, in relation to the publication of local laws and notices in Rockland county
